title: Huawei Watch_Can I configure the settings for lifting/tilting my wrist to turn on the screen in the Wrist Gestures settings?
answer: No. The settings for lifting/tilting your wrist to turn on the screen must be configured in the Android Wear app settings. For details, see the question of "How can I turn on the screen using gestures?"
keywords: Wrist Gestures, lift, tilte, wrist, turn on, screen
